channel.title: Arctic-Scape // PK server // Skilling // Bossing //
channel.description:
Hello, The server is still under construction as of now but yo can still make cash and boss + skill + PK!
Info: This server is a client + source off of Aggroth that I"m remodeling and putting in my own ideas to make it a pk server with bossing and skilling
Staff: Currently i have no moderators or Server helpers so im always looking for active and friendly staff that will get the job done.
Features:
PKING
I added pking in camelot "Spawn" Right outside as i said its a pking server.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BCk3rZD.png[/img]
BOSSIG
I've added a couple bosses with better drop rates, The drop rates as of now are only 1 in 20 - 1 in 25 depending on which boss! and yes you can solo them besides nomad, you might have to have 1 partner
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UWJsZOi.png[/img]
Penguins
I've added penguins that drop 5m each kill, and 1 in 8 chance of dropping a crystal key which will give u anything from dh worth 30m to mystery box that can give u a chance to get 30m-santa hat worth 1.5b
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NoVH2Nu.png[/img]
SHOPS
I have basic shops which are Melee, Mage, Range, Vote, Donator, Slayer, Skilling, And of course pking :)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GCwDYC6.png[/img]
There is more but like i said, the server is still undercounstruction and is currently at 0.7 almost done with beta.
Come join now! and have fun :)
Download Link .jar = http://www.mediafire.com/download/y1v6q74s2mnmoyn/Arctic1.7.jar
